title: DND capability deployment fails
content:
On the Capability settings page, the DND deployment for a tenant fails with the following message:

Failed to deploy. Please check logs for details and retry after the issue is resolved

Cause

This issue may occur because, while enabling the DND capability,  the password you created for the users contains unsupported characters such as double quote ("), forward slash (/), or backslash (\).

Solution

  1. Change the password to only include the supported characters.
  2. Redeploy the capability.
